anya-e0105n19:1_0: Ekacce pana marammaraṭṭhikā ‘‘ācariyabuddhaghoso marammaraṭṭhe sathuṁ nāma nagarato
anya-e0105n19:1_1: sīhaḷadīpaṁ gantvā saṅgahaṭṭhakathāyo akāsī’’ti vadanti. Taṁ dhammānandena anujānitvā
anya-e0105n19:1_2: ‘‘tampi thokaṁ yuttisampannaṁ, ahaṁ evaṁ saddahāmi ‘buddhaghoso dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhe
anya-e0105n19:1_3: telaṅgajātiko’ti, telaṅgajātikā ca bahū janā marammaraṭṭhe ca indocina raṭṭhe ca
anya-e0105n19:1_4: gantvā vasanti, talhiṅa? Iti vohāro ca tatoyeva telaṅgapadato uppanno. Tathā ‘buddhaghoso
anya-e0105n19:1_5: aṭṭhakathāyo katvā sīhaḷadīpato marammaraṭṭhaṁ gantvā pacchimabhāge tattheva vasī’tipi
anya-e0105n19:1_6: gahetuṁ sakkā, tassa hi ganthā marammaraṭṭhe sīhaḷaraṭṭhatopi surakkhitatarā hontī’’ti
